page.title: 17Residents of Rowlands Lane
page.content: Mr and Mrs Mills live in the end cottage of Rowlands Lane.They have lived here for six years.Before living there they lived at Upton Road,Ryde. Mr and Mrs Mills are now retired.Mr Mills used to be a member of the Ryde Harriers.He was also the first person to run around Smallbrook Stadium.He now makes wine from the fruit in his orchards.Mr Mills has two orchards containing plums,damsons and apples. Mrs Mills collects miniature bottles. She has 233 of them.Most of them come from the places she visits on holiday. Mr and Mrs Mills go on holiday once a year usually on a canal boating holiday. Mr and Mrs Mills don't go into Havenstreet for their shopping although they are very close to it. They prefer a day out at Tesco.
